name: backend
description: You have to create a simple React App which has a reusable Card Component which has the following  - Ability to pass in props to the Component  - The Card must show a person's     - Name     - A short description     - LinkedIn, Twitter and other Social Media Handle buttons     - Interests Section  - You can assume that this is kind of an e-business card and feel free to put in your creativity  - Additional & Slightly advanced:     - Create a page where you can add these kind of Cards by taking input from the user     - Create a backend server where these cards get stored in a DB and can handle basic CRUD operations     - Give the feature to perform CRUD operations from the frontend (Can be restricted to the admin only as well)
